name: Cayman Islands

typical_paths.label: Cayman fund registration orientation (informational)
bullets: High-level mapping for registered funds and private funds; specifics depend on structure and investor base.
Confirm registration, audit, and ongoing obligations with Cayman counsel/admin.

marketing_notes: Cayman structuring often pairs with onshore distribution rules; investor jurisdiction drives marketing constraints.
Always validate cross-border offering requirements where investors are located.
requires_counsel_triggers: Any uncertainty on fund classification (mutual vs private fund).
Any cross-border offering plan into regulated markets.
Any side letters or complex governance features.
